settings.heading: Which states do you ship to?
settings.row_content: AZ; CA; CO; CT; DC; FL; GA; IA; ID; IL; IN; KS; KY; LA; MA; MD; ME; MI; MN; MO; MT; NC; ND; NE; NH; NJ; NM; NV; NY; OH; OK; OR; PA; RI; SC; SD; TN; TX; VA; VT; WA; WI; WV; WY

settings.heading: Can I cancel an order?
settings.row_content:
We want to make sure you have the best wine experience with us. If you ever place an order by mistake, you can cancel it anytime before it ships.

We’re confident that you’ll love every bottle you get from us, so if something’s not right, we’ll help you find a wine you’ll love and fix the issue.

settings.heading: How are wines shipped?
settings.row_content:
We ship via UPS Ground and UPS Air.

In the summer months wine is shipped in foam, and in the winter months bottles are shipped in pulp. We only ship on specific days to make sure your wine is not sitting in a warehouse over the weekend.

settings.heading: What can I do about wines damaged during shipment?
settings.row_content: Please contact support at support@undergroundcellar.com and provide more details on your damaged package and which bottles were affected. If we have the wines in stock we can reship the damaged wine(s), otherwise we can issue a refund.
